description: This file defines API routes for managing 'to-do' items in a web application using Express.js. It includes routing middleware to connect to MongoDB, route handlers for CRUD operations, and Swagger annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list todos with filters and pagination.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific todo by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new todo.

methods.name: replace
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to replace an existing todo by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PATCH requests to partially update an existing todo.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to delete a todo by its ID.
